explanation:
Answer

x/4
Every horse has four hooves. Set up a function that assigns horse shoes to horses. The function is 4-to-1, so the number of horses is the number of horse shoes (x) divided by 4.
question: A farm orders x horse shoes for its horses. The farm does not order extras and all the horses will get new horse shoes. Apply the k-to-1 rule to determine the number of horses on the farm. Express your answer as a function of x. You should not need the ceiling or floor functions.
